thread.title: U.K. Braces for Rise in Serious Organized Crime

author: Mara Lemos Stein
title: U.K. Braces for Rise in Serious Organized Crime
text:
U.K. law enforcement is fighting an uphill battle against serious organized crime, with human trafficking, money laundering and cybercrime growing in scale and complexity in the past year, according to a new report. The report, released Monday by the National Crime Agency, calls for greater coordination among law-enforcement agencies, saying technological development and international conflict [â€¦]
